text: The Congress of the Republic () is the unicameral legislature of the Republic of Guatemala. The Guatemalan Congress is made up of 160 deputies who are elected to serve four-year terms. 31 of the deputies are elected on a nationwide list, while the rest of the 127 deputies are elected in 22 multi- member constituencies. ==Other websites== * Guatemala Guatemala Category:Politics of Guatemala Category:Organizations based in Guatemala
title: Congress of the Republic of Guatemala
